description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play as Clyde Hopper or Danger the Turtle to discover your inner swinger and become king of the swing. Race the clock and fate to save the backyard from Aunt Verna and her band of miscreant weevils. Perform tricks and get faster to increase your skill counter and improve your belt ranking from novice white to master black.
description.short: Play as Clyde Hopper or Danger the Turtle to discover your inner swinger and become king of the swing. Race the clock and fate to save the backyard from Aunt Verna and her band of miscreant weevils. Perform tricks and get faster to increase your skill counter and improve your belt ranking from novice white to master black.
